pages.text: $(violet)Repair Essence$() is used to restore the durability of active barrier rituals. When a barrier absorbs damage from explosions or entity impacts, its durability decreases. Repair Essence can restore it.

pages.title: Repair Essence Recipe
pages.text: $(l)Repair Essence Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients (arranged in circular slots):$()$(br)- 2x Glowstone Dust$(br)- Echo Shard$(br)- Full Resonant Catalyst$(br)- Amethyst Shard$(br)- Experience Bottle$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 20 XP, 600 ticks$()$(br)Yields: $(l)4 Repair Essence$()$(br2)$(#888)The ingredients are placed in the circular slots around the center output slot of the Alchemy Table. The table will process the ingredients and create 4 Repair Essence in the center output slot.$()

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(b)Repair Items:$()$(br)Hold Repair Essence in one hand and a damaged item in the other. Right-click to repair $(l)2000 durability$().$(br2)$(b)Repair Barriers:$()$(br)Right-click a $(violet)Barrier Circle$() with Repair Essence to restore barrier durability.$(br2)$(#888)Yields 4 per craft - very efficient for maintaining equipment and barriers.$()
